verses.text: Praise ye the LORD. Praise, O ye servants of the LORD, praise the name of the LORD.
Blessed be the name of the LORD from this time forth and for evermore.
From the rising of the sun to the going down of the same the LORD'S name \add is\add* to be praised.
The LORD \add is\add* high above all nations, \add and\add* his glory above the heavens.
Who \add is\add* like to the LORD our God, who dwelleth on high.
Who humbleth \add himself\add* to behold \add the things that are\add* in heaven, and in the earth!
He raiseth the poor out of the dust, \add and\add* lifteth the needy out of the dunghill;
That he may set \add him\add* with princes, \add even\add* with the princes of his people.
He maketh the barren woman to keep house, \add and to be\add* a joyful mother of children. Praise ye the LORD.
